attributes.action: introduce a ban on prams/buggys in coffee shops (cafés)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The peacefulness off our high-street coffee shops has been destroyed by pram-weilding individuals who insist on pushing their prams down every narrow aisle in the coffee shop, causing disruption and injury (pram "hit-and-run" incidents).  We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to introduce a ban on prams in coffee shops, not only to protect the peaceful environment required by so many of us, but also to reduce the number of pram-related ankle injuries suffered by non-pram driving patrons of these establishments (and consequently reducing the load on the NHS A&E departments).

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
